call forth: If something calls forth a situation or event, usually an unpleasant one, it begins a process which causes that situation or event to happen.
engage in: If you engage in an activity, you do it or are actively involved with it.
herculean task: A herculean task or ability is one that requires extremely great strength or effort.
fit into: If something fits something else or fits into it, it goes together well with that thing or is able to be part of it.
account for: If something accounts for a particular fact or situation, it causes or explains it.
set up: If you set something up, you create or arrange it.
by contrast: You say by contrast or in contrast, or in contrast to something, to show that you are mentioning a very different situation from the one you have just mentioned.
